titleStmt.title: A brief exposition on the XII. smal prophets the first volume containing an exposition on the prophecies of Hosea, Joel, & Amos. By George Hutcheson, minister at Edenburgh.
titleStmt.author: Hutcheson, George, 1615-1674.

titleStmt.title: A brief exposition on the XII. smal prophets the first volume containing an exposition on the prophecies of Hosea, Joel, & Amos. By George Hutcheson, minister at Edenburgh.
titleStmt.author: Hutcheson, George, 1615-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by T.R. and E.M.] for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: ² Y8r is a vertical half-title reading "Mr. Hutcheson on the lesser prophets"; ³A1 is a vertical half-title reading "Mr. Hutcheson's exposition on the three last prophets".
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Nouemb. 1st. 1654"; the second 5 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
